extendedInfo.description: Android app I wrote to open my garage when I get near on my motorcycle.  Don't even need to take off my gloves or helmet!This can either open immediately, or when house Wifi SSID comes into range.  Useful when you forget your house keys, too!Requires Mac/Linux & X10 gear! Read bradfitz.com/garage-opener for more info!

reviews.title: Great idea
reviews.comment: Thanks Brad. Sorry some people are not intelligent enough to investigate what they are loading on their phone. Not sure I will go this route, but I like the idea. I have the X10 gear so all I need is the BT.
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.comment: Excellent app Brad! Glad to see someone working X10 products into Android apps. Can be used to turn on or off any appliance or light in my home.
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.title: Great features - Confusing documentation
reviews.comment: This is a great app BUT the instructions are a joke. They need to be updated and streamlined so regular people can understand them. I have lots of X10 and Insteon in my house, but the documentation on this app might as well be written in Japanese. It\'s a shame because this app had great potential.
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.comment: All it does is scan. And like an idiot, I stood there for 20 minutes to complete the scanning..it never did! Piece of junk.
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.comment: Two stars just in case it works for batman or whoevers house is completely computerized mines not :-c
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.comment: For what u pay for this crap u can buy a open do ur bike cheaper
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.comment: To all: THIS APP REQUIRES X10 HARDWARE! DINT INSTALL IF YOU DONT UNDERSTAND! Awesome app!
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.comment: And to think, I used to open my garage like a savage! Now I open it the modern way!
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.comment: This app communicates with an x10 device connected to the garage door and home computer. Don\'t complain if you don\'t have the required hardware
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.comment: It works great IF you have the x10 home automation system. To the person who made this app - I think you need to clarify this more!

reviews.comment: People.. look up x10 security first and know what it is... this works excellent
